            "t",

            "n",
            "s",
            "j",
            "d",
            "c",
            "jusqu",
            "quoiqu",
            "lorsqu",

          ],
        },
        french_stop: {
          type: "stop",
          stopwords: "_french_",
        },
        french_keywords: {
          type: "keyword_marker",
          keywords: ["Example"],

          type: "stemmer",
          language: "light_french",

          filter: [
            "french_elision",
